title: Torva armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Torva armour is a set of equipment requiring level 80 Defence to equip. The individual armour pieces are obtainable only as rewards from Nex.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Torva armour
A player wearing Torva armour.

Torva armour is a set of equipment requiring level 80 Defence to equip. The individual armour pieces are obtainable only as rewards from Nex.

The pieces of armour are dropped in a broken state, and must be repaired using Bandosian components made by breaking down Bandos chestplates and tassets. Breaking down the components can only be performed at the Ancient Forge within the God Wars Dungeon's Ancient Prison.

The armour set replaced Virtus robes as a drop after testing the latter, though the Old School Team has expressed interest in introducing the robes as a reward for a different piece of content in the future.

Historical[edit | edit source]

Torva armour was one of the original rewards from Nex upon its release in RuneScape. Compared to Old School RuneScape's version of the set, the original set had several differences:

  • Having the armour equipped made all factions in the God Wars Dungeon unaggressive, rather than just Zarosian NPCs.
  • The armour required level 80 Hitpoints in addition to Strength and Defence.
  • Each piece of the set boosted Hitpoints by a certain amount, equal to 40 Hitpoints:
    • Full helm - 6.6 Hitpoints
    • Platebody - 20 Hitpoints
    • Platelegs - 13.4 Hitpoints
  • The armour degraded, lasting for 15 hours of combat. When fully degraded, the base repair costs were as follows:
    • Full helm - 500,000 coins
    • Platebody - 2,000,000 coins
    • Platelegs - 1,000,000 coins
  • The armour had the following bonuses:
Item Attack Bonuses Defence Bonuses Other
Torva full helm 0 0 0 -7 -3 +68 +73 +65 -2 +74 +3 0 0% +1
Torva platebody 0 0 0 -31 -11 +156 +140 +120 -10 +160 +4 0 0% +1
Torva platelegs 0 0 0 -21 -8 +112 +100 +95 -5 +125 +2 0 0% +1
Totals 0 0 0 -59 -22 +336 +313 +280 -17 +359 +9 0 0% +3
